alert.note: Alert for Pulaski (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued March 03 at 7:52PM CST until March 05 at 8:13AM CST by NWS Springfield
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Missouri... Roubidoux Creek Near Waynesville affecting Pulaski County. Gasconade River at Jerome affecting Phelps County. ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Missouri... Big Piney below Fort Leonard Wood -East Gate affecting Pulaski County. .Heavy rainfall received last night and today will has caused the rivers to rise above flood stage. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL SUNDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Big Piney below Fort Leonard Wood - East Gate. * WHEN...Until Sunday morning. * IMPACTS...At 14.0 feet, water at the lower TA 250 Training Ground is two feet deep. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 7:00 PM CST Friday the stage was 9.6 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 7:00 PM CST Friday was 9.6 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to a crest of 13.6 feet early tomorrow afternoon. It will then fall below flood stage early Sunday morning. - Flood stage is 8.0 feet. - Flood History...This crest compares to a previous crest of 13.6 feet on 03/21/2020. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Many flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov.
